mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RN, A.* FROM (SELECT * FROM product where (gender='남자' or gender='공용') ORDER BY joindate, codename)A) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
select * from product where (gender='남자'or gender='공용') and category=#{category} ORDER BY joindate, codename
select * from product where upper(codename) like '%'||#{codename}||'%' ORDER BY joindate, codename
select * from product where (gender='여자' or gender='공용') ORDER BY joindate, codename
select * from product where (gender='여자'or gender='공용') and category=#{category} ORDER BY joindate, codename
select * from product where gender='키즈' ORDER BY joindate, codename
select * from product where gender='키즈' and category=#{category} ORDER BY joindate, codename
